item.description: üëã Hello I’m a computational chemist and application specialist working at CSC ‚Äì IT Center for Science, the high-performance computing center of Finland. Previously, as part of my doctoral thesis project at Aalto University, I explored solid‚Äìliquid interfaces and electrocatalysis using computational methods, mostly density functional theory and molecular dynamics. This research helps us understand how to accurately model electrochemical energy conversion processes such as the production of green hydrogen.
‚úâÔ∏è Contact You can reach me by email at rasmus.kronberg@pm.me. Feel free to also connect with me on LinkedIn or GitHub.
